Errors.invalid_credentials: That email address or password has not been recognized.
Errors.existing_email: There is already an account associated with that email address.
Errors.existing_username: There is already an account which uses that user name.
Errors.limit_reached: The maximum number of members for your subscription has been reached.
Errors.cannot_demote_self: You are unable to demote yourself.
Errors.cannot_delete_self: You are unable to delete yourself from the community.

http.404: Unable to access to the server. Please try again later.
http.500: There is a problem with the server. Please try again later.

validation.app-missing: The application to open has not been chosen.
validation.link-missing: The site to open has not been chosen.
